name: mplval2
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4

stmt.origin: mplval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(c0g, c4))
stmt.pretty: mplval(hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, (Base ` c1), (0 ` c4))

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, co(c1, cress, c2))
-| wceq(c0, co(c3, cmpl, c4))

-| diffsc(hs0, c3)

-| diffsc(hs0, cfv(cbs, c1))
-| diffsc(hs0, cfv(c0g, c4))
body.pretty:
⊢ c0 =(c1[|`s]c2)
⊣ c0 =(c3[mPoly]c4)
⊣ c1 =(c3[mPwSer]c4)
⊣ (Base ` c1)=(Base ` c1)
⊣ (0 ` c4)=(0 ` c4)
⊣ c2 = { hs0 ∈(Base ` c1)| hs0[finSupp](0 ` c4)}
⊣ d(hs0, c3)
⊣ d(hs0, c4)
⊣ d(hs0,(Base ` c1))
⊣ d(hs0,(0 ` c4))
